item.description:
This social type of event is back by request because of its pleasant atmosphere of talking, excersizing, and enjoying a mixture of snacks and beverages while sitting atop the mountains and watching the sun ias it is setting..
You can bring what you want, i like bringing cheeze and a bottle of white zinfidel and other snacks to share.
Those who dont drink can bring sparkling something..i actually liked the flavor Elaine had last time..
Its not a getting drunk party..although its either the wine, people, or place that gets me intoxicated...
Ok enough of the subliminal enticement to get you to a nice location..
It is a relatively short walk of light hiking to the top of the tower...
Im not going to tell you what your visual reward is going to be a top the tower..ya just have to go to see it....so there.

Yeh you have to work a bit for your reward....its worth it..
we take our time...no hurry...
besides its all down hill on the way out....

yeh and you still can get to all the other friday evening events that are out there...

Getting There:
1 From Enfield: take 190 east...
Pass the intersection of rte 83 one mile later look for the right onto Gulf road..
Take Gulf road south for about 1.5 miles, look for the parking area of Soapstone mth on your right..
if you see Handle road you just missed it..

2 From Hartford: Take 84 east
at exit 67 = rte 31
take a left (north) on 31 go about a mile up
Take a right on rte 30 (East)
follow that till you meetup with rte 74..
stay on rte 30 by going left at the 30 sign where 74 splits off again..
Follow 30 up about 3.5 miles, this is a bit tricky, there is a left turn here called burbank st..
if you miss it and get to the intersection of 30 and 140, just take a left (east ) onto 140 and take the right onto burbank road... stay on burbank road (changes into gulf road a little ways up) for about 2.5 miles...after handle road its the left entrance way parking lot to soapstone...

for other directions type in; 300 gulf road, somers, ct..that will get you close enough...
